Hold your phone in front of your eyes, and tilt the phone until the cross is aligned with the base of the object. Tap the shutter button. Then tilt the phone upward so the cross is aligned with the top of the object. Tap the shutter button again.\n\nTap to continue.
Keep in mind that this app is only an approximation, and is based on the quality of your phone\'s sensors.
Keep your phone close to your eyes, and only tilt it up and down for accurate measurements.\n\nTap to continue.
Try to keep your phone in the same position relative to your face when you\'re tilting it.
The item you\'re measuring, has to be on the same ground level as you, or else the app will not work.
